name: Boomerang Chaos
description:
Single player, high score boomerang throwing  fury.

Throw boomerang (uncontrollably) to hit target to gain points.
But boomerang will remain on the field indefinitely.
How long can you survive a barrage  of boomerang flying around?

Movement with AWSD and aim with your cursor.

Feel free to share a screenshot of your high score.
My first game jam and special thanks to my girlfriend for agreeing to work with me in this game jam.
